levelList.name: <line-height=120%>A.B.S Max Attunement 【Degraded Corrosion】​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
After using this Skill, dies.
- If HP drops to 1 while using this Skill, maintains HP at 1 for the duration of the Skill.
[WhenUse] Deal +7.5% more damage for every 5 [Combustion] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] At 10+ ([Combustion] on self + [Combustion] on target), Base Power +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 30% missing HP on self (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal +10% more damage for every 20% missing HP on self (max 30%)

[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 10 ([Combustion] on self + [Combustion] on target) (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 30% missing HP on self (max 3)
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 4)
